title: Saudis promised double the fun in entertainment drive
text:
Saudis promised double the fun in entertainment drive 6:11pm IST - 01:35 
Saudi Arabia will stage more than 5,000 shows, festivals and concerts in 2018, double the number of last year, as it tries to shake off its conservative image in a drive to keep tourist dollars at home and lure in visitors. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia will stage more than 5,000 shows, festivals and concerts in 2018, double the number of last year, as it tries to shake off its conservative image in a drive to keep tourist dollars at home and lure in visitors.
